title: notocactus
author: notocactus
content: I need another loan$1,000 USDTPeriod: 1 monthRepayment amount: $1,100Receiving address (USDT on TRC-20): Will send in DMWho can make this deal, please leave your message here first, then we will make agreement and execute it after that.Thanks.

comments.author: shasan
comments.created_time: November 18, 2022, 04:57:37 PMLast edit: November 19, 2022, 05:37:01 PM by shasan
comments.body: Quote from: tranthidung on November 18, 2022, 03:37:16 PMI need another loan$1,000 USDTPeriod: 1 monthRepayment amount: $1,100Receiving address (USDT on TRC-20): Will send in DMWho can make this deal, please leave your message here first, then we will make agreement and execute it after that.Thanks.Please send your wallet idEdit:I have received your wallet id and sent USDT to your account. Please check your account balance and let me confirm whether you have received it or not. As you have sent the wallet ID on pm I am not posting here anything about the transaction. Please, repay on or before the due date as usual.

comments.author: notocactus

Please check your account balance and let me confirm whether you have received it or not. As you have sent the wallet ID on pm I am not posting here anything about the transaction. Please, repay on or before the due date as usual.I received it. Thank you shasan. I lock the thread now.

comments.author: notocactus
comments.body: Sent the loan repayment for two months $200.The initial loan will be repaid in January. Thank you.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: tranthidung on December 22, 2022, 06:55:00 AMSent the loan repayment for two months $200.The initial loan will be repaid in January. Thank you.Loan repayment of two months' interest has been received through the internal transaction. Thanks for the early interest repaid though initially a little late. So, the new repayment amount should be 1000$ (initial amount only) and repayment should be made on or before 18th January 2023.
